text: "Never Let Her Slip Away" is a 1978 song by Andrew Gold and it is taken from his third studio album All This and Heaven Too. It went to number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 67 in the United States, number 2 in Ireland, number 60 in Canada and number 23 in the Netherlands. It was covered by dance group Undercover in 1992. ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:Andrew Gold songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Jazz rock songs
title: Never Let Her Slip Away
